member.name: D3D10_FILL_MODE
member.summary: Determines the fill mode to use when rendering triangles.

member.name: D3D10_FILL_MODE.D3D10_FILL_WIREFRAME
member.summary: Draw lines connecting the vertices. Adjacent vertices are not drawn.

member.name: D3D10_FILL_MODE.D3D10_FILL_SOLID
member.summary: Fill the triangles formed by the vertices. Adjacent vertices are not drawn.
